Akadapanda kukhala nafe Yehova,anene tsono Israele;
Akadatimiza madziwo,mtsinje ukadapita pa moyo wathu;
madzi odzikuza akadapita pa moyo wathu.
Alemekezedwe Yehova,amene sanatipereke kumano kwao tikhale chakudya chao.
Moyo wathu unaonjoka ngati mbalame mu msampha wa msodzi;msampha unathyoka ndi ife tinaonjoka.
Thandizo lathu lili m'dzina la Yehova,wolenga kumwamba ndi dziko lapansi.
